Question.Subject: Can I open a brand new AT&T internet account if I already have an older modem?
Question.Content: Or do I have to purchase a brand new modem?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Call them & ask: http://localization.att.com/loc/controller?cdvn=landinglocalization&pid=1080&cookieResetted=true&ltype=contactus
Or go here: http://www.att.com/gen/general?pid=6431
In general, if you have a modem that isn't obsolete, you won't need to buy another
...
